sourcesContent:
<template>
  <canvas></canvas>
</template>
<script>
  import * as THREE from 'three'
  const canvas=document.createElement('canvas')
  canvas.width=800;
  canvas.height=800;
  document.body.appendChild(canvas)
  const scene=new THREE.Scene();

  const pg= new THREE.PlaneBufferGeometry(1000,200, 1, 1);
  const pm = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({color: 0xcccccc});
  const p = new THREE.Mesh(pg,pm);
  p.rotation.x=15
  p.rotation.y=0
  p.rotation.z=0
  p.rotation.x=-0.5*Math.PI;

  const geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(60, 60, 60);
  //const material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
   // color: 0x0000ff,
  //});
  const loader = new THREE.TextureLoader();
  loader.load('http://114.55.38.94:8001/picture/wenli2.jpg', (texture) => {
    const material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map: texture,});
    const cube = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material);
    scene.add(cube);
    cubes.push(cube);  // 添加到我们要旋转的立方体数组中
  });
  scene.add(p)

  const camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera();
  camera.position.set(200, 200, 200);
  camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0); //坐标原点
  // 创建渲染器对象
  const renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({
    canvas:canvas//渲染结果输出画布：canvas
  });
  renderer.render(scene, camera); //执行渲染操作



</script>
<style scoped>

</style>
